oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Systemic sustainability characteristics of organic farming: a review
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Risku-Norja, H.
Mikkola, M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The present article is a review on today's discussion and research dealing with conventional, organic and local farming for food production.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Risku-Norja, H. and Mikkola, M. (2009) Systemic sustainability characteristics of organic farming: a review. In: Programme, abstracts, list of participants, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, 5 (2), NJF Report, p. 45.
